ygData.subject: Felipe Gaucho, we will miss you
ygData.msgSnippet: I just heard the news that Felipe Gaucho, one of the most active members on this list, passed away yesterday. Terrible and shocking news this is. May he rest

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

I just heard the news that Felipe Gaucho, one of the most active members on
this list, passed away yesterday.

Terrible and shocking news this is. May he rest in peace...

http://weblogs.java.net/blog/claudio/archive/2010/03/06/felipe-gaucho-we-will-miss-you

http://www.cejug.org/2010/03/06/noticia-triste-para-o-java-no-brasil-e-o-ceara/

http://www.devoxx.com/display/DV09/Home

--000e0cd6ec36a83498048137c020
